// ----------------------------------------------------------------------
var DISTANCE=120;var TRANSITION_ENTER={duration:0.64,ease:[0.43,0.13,0.23,0.96]};var TRANSITION_EXIT={duration:0.48,ease:[0.43,0.13,0.23,0.96]};export var varFadeOut={initial:{opacity:1},animate:{opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};export var varFadeOutUp={initial:{y:0,opacity:1},animate:{y:-DISTANCE,opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{y:0,opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};export var varFadeOutDown={initial:{y:0,opacity:1},animate:{y:DISTANCE,opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{y:0,opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};export var varFadeOutLeft={initial:{x:0,opacity:1},animate:{x:-DISTANCE,opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{x:0,opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};export var varFadeOutRight={initial:{x:0,opacity:1},animate:{x:DISTANCE,opacity:0,transition:TRANSITION_ENTER},exit:{x:0,opacity:1,transition:TRANSITION_EXIT}};
